Name: Walking In The Abyss
About the game: DESCRIPTION Walking In The Abyss is a horror and suspense game. In it you will be Jack Freydis, a confused and lost man in the middle of the storm looking for help or assistance. In this search, Jack will find a large castle, hoping to find some help, ends up finding himself in an unexpected and terrifying situation. RESOURCES A castle to explore. Different monsters to face. Puzzles to solve. WHY BUY? A story full of mysteries and revelations. Great experience with 2D horror. Help a solo developer. VERY Cheap price. Developed by a BR passionate about horror games.
